testcase.name: User should be able to see second highest priced item's about this section menu
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the homepage of the application............................passed When user clicks the hamburger menu in the top left corner..................passed And user scrolls down and then Click on the TV, Appliances and Electronics link under Shop by Department section.passed And user clicks on Televisions under Tv, Audio & Cameras sub section........passed And user scrolls down and filter the results by Brand Samsung...............passed And user sorts the Samsung results with price High to Low...................passed And user clicks on the second highest priced item and window switches.......passed Then user should be able to see that About this item section present logs this section text to console-report.passed
